callback_with_context.context_function_id: ( ability_holder_component = Component("08795FD3-D435-4911-9245BB2E79B38EA8"), this_initiative_set_key = InitiativeSetContext.Key, rarity = ability_holder_component.ChildList.Filter(IsVisible && GetProperty("kairos_initiative_set_key") == this_initiative_set_key).FirstContext.GetProperty("rarity") ) => { GetIfElse( rarity == "common", Loc("wh3_kairos_fragments_of_sorcery_rarity_ability_common"), GetIfElse( rarity == "uncommon", Loc("wh3_kairos_fragments_of_sorcery_rarity_ability_uncommon"), GetIfElse( rarity == "rare", Loc("wh3_kairos_fragments_of_sorcery_rarity_ability_rare"), "" ) ) ) }
